alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lawrence; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 10:26PM MDT until June 20 at 10:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CUSTER...SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE AND WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1026 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from O`Neil Pass to near Deerfield to 7 miles southwest of Bear Mountain Lookout, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rochford, Flag Mountain, Cheyenne Crossing, Deerfield, Deerfield Reservoir, Crooks Tower, Bear Mountain Lookout, O`Neil Pass, Black Fox Campground, Medicine Mountain and Redbank Spring Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
